settlegeocategories-i18n-welcome: Welcome to the localization file of the SettleGeoCategories extension.
settlegeocategories-main-categories-intr: Please select a main category below. Only categories that contain at least one article are displayed.
settlegeocategories-sub-categories-intro: Please select a sub-category below. Only categories that contain at least one article are displayed.
settlegeocategories-articles-categories-: Below you can see list of articles within selected category.
